name: deviceManagement_UpdateUserExperienceAnalyticsBatteryHealthRuntimeDetails
description: Update the navigation property userExperienceAnalyticsBatteryHealthRuntimeDetails in deviceManagement

$block: The user experience analytics battery health runtime entity contains count of devices broken down into 3 categories - devices with runtime > 5 hours, devices with runtime 3-5 hours and devices with runtime < 3 hours.This API provides the count of devices in these 3 categories.

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for an entity. Read-only.
**activeDevices**: Number of active devices within the tenant. Valid values -2147483648 to 2147483647
**batteryRuntimeFair**: Number of devices whose active runtime is greater than 3 hours but lesser than 5 hours. Valid values -2147483648 to 2147483647
**batteryRuntimeGood**: Number of devices  whose active runtime is greater than 5 hours. Valid values -2147483648 to 2147483647
**batteryRuntimePoor**: Number of devices whose active runtime is lesser than 3 hours. Valid values -2147483648 to 2147483647
**lastRefreshedDateTime**: Recorded date time of this runtime details instance.
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
**client-request-id**: Client request Id as sent by the client application.
**request-id**: Request Id as tracked internally by the service
